00019 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORRunDataTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00020 {
00021   EReturnCode retCode = ORBasicTreeWriter::InitializeBranches();
00022   if(retCode >= kFailure) return retCode;
00023   fTree->Branch("bytesProcessed", &fByteCount, "bytes/i");
00024   return kSuccess;
00025 }

00028 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORRunDataTreeWriter::ProcessDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00029 {
00030   fByteCount += fRunDecoder->LengthOf(record)*sizeof(UInt_t);
00031   return ORBasicTreeWriter::ProcessDataRecord(record);
00032 }

00034 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORRunDataTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00035 {
00036   ORBasicTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(record); // fTree is filled here
00037   if (fRunDecoder->IsHeartBeat(record)) fByteCount = 0;
00038   return kSuccess;
